item.title: Saghar add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "And forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair" -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Saghar add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "The universe may not always play fair, but at least it's got a hell of a sense of humor." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Saghar add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Saghar add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "The wound is the place where the Light enters you." -- Rumi

item.title: Saghar add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment." -- Rumi

item.title: Saghar add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free." -- Rumi

item.title: Saghar add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description: "Knock, And He'll open the door Vanish, And He'll make you shine like the sun Fall, And He'll raise you to the heavens Become nothing, And He'll turn you into everything." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Saghar add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
item.description: "I caught the happy virus last night When I was out singing beneath the stars. It is remarkably contagious - So kiss me." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
